import React,{useContext,useState,useEffect} from 'react'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faUser, faPenToSquare, faArrowsRotate } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import './styles/profile.css' import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import AuthContext from "../context/AuthContext"; export const EditProfile = () => { const { fetchData } = useContext(AuthContext); const [data,setData] = useState({}); const call = async () => { setData(await fetchData()) } useEffect( () => call(),[]) return ( <>
